work.label: work
work.description: Production-grade backend engineering in banking and payments, focused on reliability, security, and transaction integrity at scale.

items.title: Java Developer — Mindgate Solutions
items.intro: Backend developer working on high-volume transaction systems, bulk corporate payments, and critical banking infrastructure.
items.details:
Building and maintaining production banking and payment platforms.

Responsibilities:
- Backend transaction processing and validation
- Bulk corporate payment workflows
- Critical infrastructure improvements and reliability work
- Auditability, reconciliation, and traceability
- Performance and resiliency tuning
- Java, Spring Boot, microservices
- OracleDB and PostgreSQL
items.note: Notes emphasize production constraints: idempotency, reconciliation, audit trails, deterministic error handling, and operational safety.

projects.label: projects
projects.description: Selected engineering systems spanning secure banking platforms, web builds, tooling, and applied prototypes.

items.title: WiFi Trolley Bot — ESP32
items.intro: WiFi-controlled trolley bot built on ESP32 with real-time control logic.
items.details:
Designed an ESP32-based trolley bot with wireless control capability.

Highlights:
- ESP32 WiFi control
- Motor control and navigation
- Lightweight firmware structure
- Hardware-software integration
items.note: Hands-on embedded project emphasizing control logic and reliable WiFi command handling.

items.title: Conference Site
items.intro: Website for SASTRA ICMAT conference with a structured flow for paper submissions.
items.details:
Built the ICMAT conference site for SASTRA, focused on clear submission flow and accessible event information.

Highlights:
- Paper submission guidance and calls
- Schedule and speaker section layout
- Clean, responsive UI
- Structured content sections
items.note: Designed to minimize confusion around submission requirements and keep deadlines and tracks easy to find.

items.title: Theta2k23 — Event Web Presence
items.intro: Fest site for SASTRA Theta2k23 with fast access to events and updates.
items.details:
Created a fest website for Theta2k23, highlighting event lists, announcements, and quick navigation.

Highlights:
- Compact, focused content
- Mobile-first layout
- Simple navigation flow
- Event-centric sections
items.note: Prioritizes speed and clarity for event attendees on mobile.

items.title: Hell Pine — VS Code Theme Extension
items.intro: Forked from Rosé Pine and customized for higher contrast and personal workflow.
items.details:
Built a VS Code theme by forking Rosé Pine and customizing colors for clarity and long coding sessions.

Highlights:
- Rosé Pine base with tuned contrasts
- Adjusted token colors for readability
- Extension packaging and publishing
- Consistent UI appearance
items.note: Theme focuses on readability and personalized color balance without losing the Rosé Pine character.

items.title: TheGlobe — Freelance Web Build
items.intro: Website for a digital marketing organization with a clean, business-first layout.
items.details:
Delivered a freelance website for a digital marketing company, emphasizing clear service presentation and client trust.

Highlights:
- Business-focused information architecture
- Responsive layout and performance
- Clean components and styling system
- Client-ready delivery
items.note: Focused on clarity, credibility, and a solid handoff for client ownership.

items.title: Neovim Configuration — nvim
items.intro: Modern Neovim setup for development speed, ergonomics, and consistent tooling.
items.details:
Curated Neovim configuration focused on developer velocity.

Highlights:
- Modular Lua configuration
- LSP and formatter integration
- Fast startup and workflow shortcuts
- Opinionated plugin setup
items.note: Config-first productivity project with an emphasis on speed and maintainability.

research.label: research
research.description: Academic research in cybersecurity and applied machine learning, centered on intrusion detection models and IIoT datasets.

items.title: HGCNN–LSTM Intrusion Detection
items.intro: Hybrid deep-learning intrusion detection system for cyber-physical networks.
items.details:
Hybrid IDS model combining Hierarchical Gated CNN (HGCNN) for spatial feature extraction and LSTM for temporal sequence modeling.

Key Contributions:
- HGCNN + LSTM end-to-end pipeline
- Multi-class CPS attack detection
- Evaluation on IIoT benchmark data
- Clear ablation and error analysis
items.note: Notebook-driven experiments detailing preprocessing, feature engineering, and model training with reproducible metrics.

items.title: Intrusion Detection System (IIoT) — Hybrid CNN + LSTM
items.intro: Deep-learning IDS for IIoT networks using a hybrid CNN + LSTM approach.
items.details:
Hybrid CNN + LSTM IDS designed to detect malicious IIoT traffic with improved accuracy on benchmark data.

Highlights:
- UNSW-NB15 benchmark dataset
- CNN for attack event detection
- LSTM for temporal sequence modeling
- Focus on lowering misclassification and false alarms
items.note: Notebook-driven workflow with clear dataset preprocessing, model training, and evaluation steps.

items.title: HGCNN-LSTM — Cyber Attack Detection in Cyber-Physical Systems
items.intro: Data-driven intrusion detection research using HGCNN + LSTM for CPS environments.
items.details:
Research implementation focused on cyber-physical system security.

Highlights:
- HGCNN + LSTM architecture
- Sequence modeling for CPS data
- Multi-class detection focus
- Reproducible notebook workflow
items.note: Detailed model notebook includes preprocessing, training curves, and confusion-matrix evaluation.

items.title: HyperCoar-DAM — Robust IDS for IIoT Networks
items.intro: Robust intrusion detection approach focused on IIoT network protection.
items.details:
Research prototype targeting robust IDS performance in IIoT.

Highlights:
- Robust detection objective
- Focus on IIoT threat resilience
- Notebook-based workflow
- Reproducible experimentation
items.note: Research artifact documents robustness-focused training and evaluation within Jupyter notebooks.

items.title: Genetic Programming Approach for Advanced Persistent Threat Detection
items.intro: Tree-based genetic programming approach for APT detection on highly imbalanced cyber-attack data.
items.details:
Research project targeting APT detection using a tree-based genetic programming algorithm trained on highly imbalanced data (99:1).

Highlights:
- Genetic programming classifier (tree-based)
- Handles extreme class imbalance (99:1)
- Python-based experimentation pipeline
- Reproducible training and evaluation workflow
items.note: Focuses on imbalance-aware training and GP-driven model evolution for minority attack detection.

education.label: education
education.description: Formal academic background with a focus on systems, software engineering, and ML fundamentals.

items.title: B.Tech Computer Science — SASTRA
items.intro: Strong foundation in core CS topics and engineering practice.
items.details:
Focused on systems engineering, full-stack development, and applied ML.

Highlights:
- OS, DBMS, Networks, Data Structures
- Research-oriented curriculum
- Technical leadership roles
items.note: Academics emphasize systems foundations and practical engineering practice with research exposure.
